articles.title: Trade Spotlight | What should be your strategy for EID Parry, LIC of India, KEC International today - Moneycontrol
articles.description: LIC saw a decisive breakout of long falling resistance trendline adjoining highs of December 20 last year, and August 11 this year. The stock has formed a bullish candlestick pattern with long upper shadow on the daily charts with strong volumes.
